title: Antonio Tabucchi - Indian Nocturne (2013) [epub]
description:
In Tabucci's dream-like novel of 1984 a man is searching for a missing friend.

He trawls the malodorous back streets,brothels and seedy hotels of Bombay, Madras and the hippie hangouts of Goa.

Ã¢â‚¬ËœYou Europeans are very delicateÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ remarks a doctor, who lifts his toupee up and down like a hat, Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½a lot of people lose their way in IndiaÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.

Fragmented, enigmatic and hypnotising the story offers vibrant images - floors teeming with black cockroaches, prostitute shacks the size of sentry boxes, crows in grand hotel gardens pecking at orange peel in Martini glasses and being chased off by cricket bat wielding servants.

Will the narrator find his friend,or is he really on a quest to find himself?

The book won the French Prix MÃƒÂ©dicis ÃƒÂ©tranger in 1987
